description: This file defines an API route for scheduling operations within a manufacturing system. It provides an endpoint that returns upcoming work order operations, filtered by time range and status, with role-based access control.

classes.name: WorkOrderOperationRead
classes.description: Schema used for serializing WorkOrderOperation objects in responses.

methods.name: List[WorkOrderOperationRead] upcoming_operations( session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_tenant_session), from_time: Optional[datetime] = Query(None, description="Only operations with planned_start >= from_time"), to_time: Optional[datetime] = Query(None, description="Only operations with planned_start <= to_time"), status: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by status"), limit: int = Query(200, ge=1, le=2000), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0), )
methods.description: API endpoint that fetches a list of upcoming work order operations filtered by optional time range, status, limit, and offset. Ensures only authorized roles can access.

ctags.name: upcoming_operations
ctags.signature: ( session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_tenant_session), from_time: Optional[datetime] = Query(None, description="Only operations with planned_start >= from_time"), to_time: Optional[datetime] = Query(None, description="Only operations with planned_start <= to_time"), status: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by status"), limit: int = Query(200, ge=1, le=2000), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0), )
